data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Schmidt, Brian K., Foster, Jeffrey T., Angehr, George R., Durrant, Kate L., Fleischer, Rob- Ert C. (2008): A new species of African Forest Robin from Gabon (Passeriformes: Muscicapidae: Stiphrornis). Zootaxa 1850: 27-42, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.183380
